About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

A Mini-Biography

I'm David Salazar, a husband, business owner, Front-End Web Developer, and aspiring Full-Stack. Born in McAllen, TX and was raised a tennis player. Lived in Nashville, New York, United Kingdom, and St. Louis. But these days I live in Austin, TX.

Army West Point

Assistant Men's Tennis Coach
2014 - 2015

Conducted and organized tennis practices while complying with NCAA rules and regulations. Went undefeated in the Patriot League Conference.

Edward Jones

Financial Advisor
2016 - Feb 2018
